name: CitiAlly
overview:
CitiAlly offers a professional networking service focused on Africa and the Middle East. The site enables users to keep a professional contact book, create groups, schedule events and even write blogs about their profession or business. Next scheduled update will include several new features including revenue generating capability for members.

CitiAlly aims to help professionals find new contacts, find employment or simply discuss topics of interest with like minded professionals.

CitiAlly helps individuals manage their contact base, based on a career interest or a business interest. Entrepreneurs can promote a business or discuss a business idea (to help them attract investors, partners, key affiliates or employees).
